page.title: 02MY HOUSE
page.content: My house is about 200 years old.It used to be two semi-detached houses but when the owners of one of the houses died it was turned into a farm which kept cows and pigs.The pigshed is now used for storing wood.We still have plenty of our own pets. Our house has got twelve rooms which are all in use.Some people say that our house was once a{pub.}Next to our house there is a hill named {BULL HILL .It was once used as a sand pit,but now it has been left to grow wild.Cows and Sheep now graze there. My Dad works for{British Telecom}in {Ashbourne}and my Mum works in the house. {BY PETER COWLEY
